caption.p: In vitro macrophage activation activities of S. sanghuang polysaccharides. ( a) cell cytotoxicity test of six polysaccharide fractions; ( b) The effects of six polysaccharide fractions on NO Production from RAW 264.7 cells. Each value represents the mean Â± SD. * p < 0.05, ** p < 0.01 compared to control group.
